name: Plum Branch Arrangement: "Boundless Spring"
description:
A Lantern Rite gift from Hu Tao.
This ornament takes the plum branch from Hu Tao's hat as its centerpiece, making it a keepsake of great significance.
"The night was suddenly filled with the fragrance of plum blossoms, spreading across the springtime sky and land."
The petals on the branch are as full of vibrant energy as the Director herself. If you find yourself missing her but are unable to meet, let this plum branch be a small comfort to you.
